CustomField.description:
Checked: updates the account team for accounts and chain accounts on edit even if the chain account field was not updated.
Unchecked: Updates the account team for accounts and chain accounts on edit only if the chain account field was updated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Checked: updates the account team for accounts and chain accounts on edit even if the chain account field was not updated.
Unchecked: Updates the account team for accounts and chain accounts on edit only if the chain account field was updated.
CustomField.label: Override Account Team Assignment
